plot outline: Two men in her life and she does not know who to choose to be her life partner. Tough decision to take but by not taking a decision she makes it more tough not just for herself but for all around her. Taking a decision matters but taking it at right time matters more. And taking the right decision, of course, all important.
title: Kaadhali
